name: Amazing Horse Race Free - Quarter Horse Racing Simulator Game
name_original: Amazing Horse Race Free - Quarter Horse Racing Simulator Game
description:
** BEAUTIFUL HORSES! **

** RACE AGAINST OTHER PEOPLE AROUND THE WORLD! **

Saddle your horse and be ready for a great horse racing event!

Choose between four magnificent horses and race to win the derby!

In this horse racing championship you can also race against other people around the world!

We also have leaderboards. You can compare your score to your friends!

My horse is ready! How about yours?!

Lets race!
